import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {MdShoppingBasket } from 'react-icons/md' import {Container, Cart} from './style' import logo from '../../assets/image/logo.svg' function Header({cart}) { return (
Meu Carrinho 3 itens
) } export default connect (state => ({ cart: state.cart, }))(Header)
